`,(0,Y.jsxDEV)(g.pre,{children:(0,Y.jsxDEV)(g.code,{className:"language-js",children:`const Alert = ({ alertText, alertIcon }) => {
  const icons = ["alert"];
  return (
    <div className="alertcontainer">
      {alertText}
      {alertIcon}
    </div>
    // comentario del bloque de c\xF3digo
  );
};

export default Alert;
